functions.name: evaluate
functions.purpose: To evaluate a mathematical expression in Javascript

functions.name: execute
functions.purpose: Execute a bash command in terminal

functions.name: crawl
functions.purpose: crawl a given url and gets its raw HTML body

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: URL of the page to be crawled

arguments.name: maxChars
arguments.description: Maximum characters to be returned in response. Use this if the LLM model has token limits

arguments.name: filePath
arguments.description: Path of the file to read

functions.name: writeFile
functions.purpose: create a new file and write text to it

arguments.name: fileName
arguments.description: the full relative path including the filename of the file to be created

arguments.name: dirPath
arguments.description: relative path of the directory to be created

issues.description: Tool has 2 functions but adapter only exposes the first one
Tool identifier doesn't match tool purpose (file_reader_tool for file writer)

functions.name: screenshot
functions.purpose: Take the screenshot of given page and save it in the path provided

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: Url of the page to be screenshotted

issues.description: Returns object with isImage flag and base64 data instead of simple string

functions.name: search
functions.purpose: To do google search and get the results in JSON format

arguments.name: dateRange
arguments.description: To return search results within the given date range. Values can be week, month, year

issues.description: Tool has init() method that needs to be called before use

functions.name: start
functions.purpose: Runs npm run start on the folder you specifies as the argument

arguments.name: folder
arguments.description: Folder where npm run start should be executed

functions.name: readServerOutput
functions.purpose: To read the output from a started server

issues.note: Function has no arguments - adapter should handle empty args object

issues.description: Tool has 2 functions but adapter only exposes the first one

functions.name: convertToMarkdown
functions.purpose: To crawl the given URL and return a markdown string with relevant tags such as H1, H2 etc

arguments.name: maxChars
arguments.description: Maximum characters to be returned in response. Use this if the LLM model has token limits

functions.name: fetchTranscript
functions.purpose: Fetch the transcription by youtube video id

arguments.name: videoId
arguments.description: ID of the youtube video. It can be found in the URL query parameter "v"

recommendations.recommendation:
Modify ToolAdapter to handle multiple functions by either:
  1. Creating separate tool instances for each function
  2. Returning an array of function descriptions
  3. Creating a multiplexer that routes to the correct function

Add initialization support to ToolAdapter:
  1. Check for init() method in constructor
  2. Add setConfig() method to adapter
  3. Pass through initialization before first use
